items.title: Capability > Features
items.content: This principle connects to Ralph's 'compound over time' philosophy and Gas Town's role specialization.

items.title: The 200-turn disaster
items.content: A team let a session run for 200 turns. Context degradation caused the AI to forget the project structure entirely.

items.title: Control vs Speed
items.content: More human oversight = higher quality but slower. Less oversight = faster but riskier. The balance depends on stakes.
